sensor files should look like this:

# required vars:
# - uid
# - entity_id

sensor:
  - id: ${uid}_battery_soc
    platform: homeassistant
    entity_id: ${entity_id}
    on_value:
      - lvgl.label.update:
          id: ${uid}_label
          text: !lambda |-
            return ("Battery SoC: " + std::to_string((int)x) + "%").c_str();


'Widget' files should look like this (note the obj: is commented out because this is included)

# required vars:
# - uid
# - width
# - height

# obj:  
  id: ${uid}_container
  width: ${width}
  height: ${height}
  widgets:
    - label:
        id: ${uid}_label
        text: "Battery SoC: --%"
        align: center

the includes look like this:

            widgets:
              - button: # main floor lights
                  <<: !include
                    file: widgets/battery_soc_widget.yaml
                    vars:
                      uid: volvo_ex30
                      entity_id: sensor.volvo_ex30_mqtt_battery_charge_level
                      text: Volvo EX30
                      <<: *wide_button_widget_vars


  volvo_ex30_widget_sensors: !include { file: widgets/battery_soc_sensors.yaml, vars: {
    uid: volvo_ex30,
    entity_id: sensor.volvo_ex30_mqtt_battery_charge_level
  }}
